subject: Thank you for your recent refinance loan request, we are ready to lend you some cash regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this offer will expire TODAY):
$359,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://doabcoacking.com/
